thread.title: The One Thing NYT Doesn’t Want You To Call The Muslim Brotherhood Will Make Your Jaw Drop
thread.title_full: The One Thing NYT Doesn’t Want You To Call The Muslim Brotherhood Will Make Your Jaw Drop

author: John S. Roberts
title: The One Thing NYT Doesn’t Want You To Call The Muslim Brotherhood Will Make Your Jaw Drop
text:
09:35pm February 9, 2017 Do you like this article? 
The Donald Trump administration is currently debating whether or not to label the Muslim Brotherhood a terrorist organization. 
If it were up to the New York Times , the Muslim Brotherhood would never receive the designation. 
Why? 
Because calling terrorists ‘terrorists’ will make terrorists angry with America. 
For real, guys? 
From Daily Caller : 
The New York Times editorial board thinks President Trump shouldn’t designate the Muslim Brotherhood a terrorist organization because it could make Trump the enemy of all Muslims. 
The liberal paper published Thursday an editorial Thursday titled “All of Islam Isn’t the Enemy” arguing against the move, which the Trump administration is reportedly considering as a possible option. CIA Director Mike Pompeo has said he supports designating the group, which is open about its goal of creating a state ruled by Islamic law, as a terrorist organization. 
“Is President Trump trying to make enemies of the entire Muslim world? That could well happen if he follows up his primitive ban on refugees and visa holders from seven Muslim nations with an order designating the Muslim Brotherhood — perhaps the most influential Islamist group in the Middle East — as a terrorist organization,” the editors charged. 
This is silly. 
The mosque that was attacked in Canada recently “was founded by followers of the Muslim Brotherhood and donated money to front organizations that directly support terrorists groups like Hamas, via Gateway Pundit . 
If it walks like a duck and it quacks like a duck, it’s probably a duck. LIKE this article?
